decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted 8th July 2016 and numbered Site Location Plan, and Site Photographs & Site Block Plan, 13th July 2016 and numbered Daylight and Sunlight Report, and BW/1201/02, 13th September 2016 and numbered BW/1201/03a, and 19th September 2016 e-mail confirming details of Daylight and Sunlight Report, therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
description: Erection of a single storey and part two storey rear extensions to the house
